= How to report errors =

== Post you Logfile ==

I just have the german path, there you can find a logfile here:
C:\Dokumente und Einstellungen\***\Anwendungsdaten\Pandora's Box 3

English must be like (someone can correct it please):
C:\Documants and Settings\***\ApplicationData\Pandora's Box 3

there must be a file named **Log.txt**. The content may be useful to find bugs, especialy when where is no exception thrown.
